TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRepeatInfoUser

Docs.summary: Defines the properties and methods that must be implemented by any list control that repeats a list of items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> interface defines the properties and methods that must be implemented by all list controls that repeats a list of items, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>. To indicate whether a list control contains a heading section, footer section, or separators, this interface defines the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.HasHeader%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.HasFooter%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.HasSeparators%2A> properties, respectively. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.RepeatedItemCount%2A> property is used to represent the number of items in the list. Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.GetItemStyle%2A> method to determine the style of an item in the list. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.RenderItem%2A> method is used to display an item.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style GetItemStyle (System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType itemType, int repeatIndex);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style GetItemStyle(valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType itemType, int32 repeatIndex) cil managed

abstract member GetItemStyle : System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType * int -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style

Docs.param: An ordinal index that specifies the location of the item in the list control.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the style of the specified item type at the specified index in the list control.
Docs.returns: A that represents the style of the specified item type at the specified index in the list control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A list control that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser> interface must implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IRepeatInfoUser.GetItemStyle%2A> method to retrieve the style of the specified item type at the specified index in the list control.
